    • Method Detail

      • getPeerInfo

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getPeerInfo(int remoteId,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.Object> input,
                                           int infoType)
        This method is used to ask for information from the peer. infoType specifies what information you are asking for. different types are listed in the Message class. input is the list of arguments that you may want your peer to use to gather the necessary information on your behalf

      • getItemsFromPeer
